final_project_definition_document.executive_summary: BRQ202 Survey Management System represents a comprehensive solution for enabling systematic customer feedback collection across all business domains. The system addresses critical business needs for customer insights while maintaining strict compliance and regulatory requirements. With Junior Level expertise baseline across Customer Distribution, Enterprise Enabling, Risk Management, Marketing & Sales, and Product & Services domains, the solution provides a balanced approach to functionality and complexity.
final_project_definition_document.business_justification: Current manual survey processes create inefficiencies, compliance risks, and missed opportunities for customer insights. The proposed system will reduce survey creation time by 75%, ensure 100% regulatory compliance, and provide integrated customer feedback capabilities across all business channels.
final_project_definition_document.scope_confirmation: The project includes survey template management, compliance engine, system integrations, user training, and ongoing support. Excluded are advanced analytics platforms, third-party integrations beyond specified systems, and mobile application development.
final_project_definition_document.implementation_approach: Phased implementation with compliance and security as primary design principles, followed by user experience optimization and system integration. Junior Level expertise ensures appropriate complexity management and user adoption focus.
final_project_definition_document.success_metrics: Success measured through user adoption rates (80%+), compliance achievement (100%), system performance (99.9% uptime), and business value delivery (25% efficiency improvement, 15% insight accuracy improvement).
